phrases.phrase: Show feedback in member stat pairs
Show user avatars instead of default image on listings with no cover
The maximum number of other listings to display from a resource's author. Use 0 to disable this block.
If enabled, listings that expire will be closed
If enabled, user feedback will be added to the member quick stats on profile and card.
The amount of feedback to show per page on a user's feedback area

Instructions on generating and retrieving your API key can be found here. The Geocoding API, Places API, Google Maps JavaScript API and Google Maps Embed API should all be enabled for full integration.
When viewing the listing index or category overview pages, this will be the default order for listings.
The layout type you want used on the classifieds index. Note: Can be overridden by categories.

Controls the currencies that users can select to apply to their listings. Add one currency per line. Each currency can only be 3 characters (USD, GBP, etc). A symbol will be used to display the currency if possible.
When a listing is deleted, take this action with any automatically created thread.
The number of listings that will be listed per page, when using the grid layout type.
The number of listings that will be listed per page, when using the list layout type.
When a listing has no cover image, show the creator's avatar in the list of listings.
Options that control the classifieds add-on.
Manage tags by others in own listing
The css classes to use for negative feedback. Ex: fa fa-thumbs-down
The css classes to use for positive feedback. Ex: fa fa-meh
The css classes to use for positive feedback. Ex: fa fa-thumbs-up
This defines the set of colors and icons used for coloring the classifieds feedback system. It is recommended to respect the XenForo icon weight.
Listings near the currently viewed listing
Displays the most recently added listings.
Displays the user the page is for's feedback. Recommended to be only used with listing view.
Displays inside the side navigation on the classifieds category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
Displays inside the side navigation on the classifieds listing view page.
Displays inside the side navigation on the classifieds overview page.
All selected listings are already in destination category. Please select another.
Allow location to be set for listed items
If enabled, a location field will be available on the listing create/edit form. This location field will be used to display a Google Map on the listing and to support filtering by location.
Allow users to contact you by conversation
Allow users to contact you by email
Conditions allow users to specify and inform others about what condition the item is currently in. If no conditions are selected here, the option is disabled and will not appear for this category.
Allow only certain conditions. If none are selected the option is disabled.
Types are a way of identifying what kind of listing a user has created. By default, these are used to differentiate by "Want to buy" listings vs "Want to sell" listings.
The listings you have selected are located in more than one category. Each listing will only be updated if the chosen prefix is valid in its category.
Apply prefix to selected classifieds listings
Assign listings to first viewable category.
Automatically post in the listing thread on listing deletion
Packages allow you to setup constraints for how long a listing should last and how much that should cost the end user, if anything.
Please confirm that you want to remove this listing condition
Please confirm that you want to remove this listing type
Please confirm that you want to remove this package
Allow users to list custom contact information
If enabled, an additional text field will be displayed when creating a listing allowing advertisers to add custom contact information.
Allow users to contact listing owner by conversation
If enabled, this will allow users to contact advertisers directly from the listing. Advertisers can also disable this behaviour on a per-listing basis.
Allow users to contact listing owner by the user's email

If enabled, this will allow users to contact advertisers directly from the listing. A preferred email address can be set for each listing and advertisers can also disable this behaviour on a per-listing basis.
At least one of these must be enabled.
Use this field to specify CSS classes for this listing type.
You may use this field to provide alternative forms of contact.
If enabled, the amount of days for a listing to be live
If enabled, users will be allowed to set prices for the listings that they create in this category.
If enabled, users will be able to pay to upgrade their listing to featured. Set the amount of days a listing is featured below.
Allow prices to be set for listed items
Exclude expired listings from listing count
When enabled, listings that expire will reduce the listing count.
The price to charge a user to feature their listing
The amount of negative feedback the user has received. This will be subtracted from positive for calculating the total.
The amount of positive feedback the user has received.
The amount of total feedback received (positive - negative) feedback. Will be overridden when changing positive or negative. Also is changed when feedback for towards user is given.
The selected forum is already assigned to a category.
A full size view, displaying as a standard classifieds list.
How would you rate your experience with this transaction?
If enabled, a moderator will have to manually approve listings posted in this category.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the creator's behalf explaining that the listing is no longer available.
The default body of new listings in this category.

{username} submitted a new listing:
[url={listing_link}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url] - [plain]{title}[/plain]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={listing_link}]Learn more about this listing...[/url]
This listing has been removed and is no longer available for viewing.
{listing} - New classifieds listing in watched category
The classifieds listing {title} was reassigned to you.
Listings of '{title}' type will be reassigned to the selected type.
Moderate new listings posted in this category
You must specify a listing type
No classifieds categories exist at this time.
No conditions have been created. Create one now
No listing types have been created. Create one now
No listings have been created yet.
No packages have been created. Create one now
No prefixes are available for the specified categories.
Notify the current and new owners of this action.
Notify members watching the destination category
One of your featured classifieds listings has expired. Renew now!
Paid packages must provide at least one payment profile.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following feedback
Please confirm you wish to feature this item for the displayed fee
Please confirm you wish to list this item for the displayed fee
Please select a valid listing type.
Please select at least one listing condition
Please select at least one listing type

You may use these fields to configure the header text shown in the quick info area of a listing. You'll need to navigate to Appearance -> Phrases first and create new phrases or customise the existing ones.
When enabled will replace the "Post threads" button in this forum's thread list with a button for posting new listings.
Requested category could not be found.
The requested listing could not be found.
Require listings to have an image attachment
Enabling will require all new listings to have at least one image attachment.
Require listing purchaser name to mark listing as sold
When enabled, will require the owner of a listing to add the username of the user who received their item in order to mark it as sold.

Thank you for purchasing this upgrade.

When the payment has been approved, your listing will be upgraded.
There are currently no listings that match your filters.
There are no listings to display.
This will fully wipe sold status from listing including whoever is marked as sold.
Update thread title on listing deletion
User has at least X classifieds feedback
User has submitted at least X classifieds listings

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category "{category}" at {board} with email notification of new classifieds listings.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{author} created a classifieds listing within a category you are watching at {board}.
{author} updated a listing you are watching at {board}.
What was your role in this transaction?
{fromUser} has left feedback on your listing {title}. Click here to view it.
{name} has not posted any listings yet.
{name} has not received any feedback yet.
{name} mentioned you in the classifieds listing {title}.
{name} reacted to your classifieds listing {title} with {reaction}.
{name} reacted to your classified listing {title} with {reaction}.
You cannot delete all listing types.
You cannot mark a listing as sold to yourself.
You have been listed as the aquirer of an item listed by user {user}. You can now leave feedback about the transaction.
You have not posted any listings yet.
You may not perform this action because the listing has been closed.
You may not start a conversation with this user.
You must upload at least one image attachment.
You are not watching any listings.
Are you sure you want to apply a prefix to {total} listing(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} listing(s)?
Are you sure you want to mark all listings read?
Are you sure you want to mark {listing} as sold?
Are you sure you want to move {total} classifieds listings(s)?
Are you sure you want to reassign {total} listing(s)?
Are you sure you want to stop watching all listings?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this listing?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all listings?
Your classifieds listing {title} was moved to a different category.
